title: All my collected website addresses are missing after the Firefox is updated to Version 16
content: All my collected website addresses are missing after the Firefox is updated to Version 16. How to retrieve them?
creator: wzlbnu

title: Keyboard accessibility for new search bar?
content:
Upgraded to 139.0.1 and enabled new search bar, which wasn't appearing without toggling browser.urlbar.scotchBonnet.enableOverride to true. However, the bar seems critically hindered by lack of keyboard accessibility. Two things in particular:

1) when quick actions appear (e.g., Clear recent history), I cannot figure out how to navigate to it with the keyboard. Down-arrowing simply skips over it.

2) I don't seem to be able to select which search engine to use. On Mac, Option+up/down used to select search engines with the old address bar, but no key combination seems to move through or activate the drop-down menu of search engine choices.

The page introducing the feature doesn't seem to explain how to use it with keyboard at all. (https://blog.mozilla.org/en/firefox/address-bar/?utm_source=www.mozilla.org)
creator: jeremy

title: Tab groups on firefox android
content: Hi. I have switched over from Google. It would be extremely helpful if an option for tabbing groups, such as what Google has, was made available for Firefox Android. I know there are extensions but I have not found a single one that either works properly or works at all on Android. Thanks.
creator: teficorrea11
